content:
Check:
  all:
    - name:
      operator:
    - name: --MODIFY
      operator: empty
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0047
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error when --TERM has been modified for coding and --MODIFY is
  null
Outcome:
  Message: --MODIFY is not populated when --TERM has been modified for coding
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0047
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: A value which represents an alteration to a collected
                  value for coding purposes. Synonym Qualifier of --TERM.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --MODIFY
                Section: Events
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - EVENTS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Trigger error when --TERM has been modified for coding and --MODIFY is null

Outcome.Message: --MODIFY is not populated when --TERM has been modified for coding

Citations.Cited_Guidance: A value which represents an alteration to a collected value for coding purposes. Synonym Qualifier of --TERM.
